```{r}
library("Biobase")
library("DESeq2")
library("ddhw")
```

Import the pasilla dataset and calculate p--values for differential expression:

```{r}
library("pasilla")
data("pasillaGenes")
countData <- counts(pasillaGenes)
colData <- pData(pasillaGenes)[,c("condition","type")]
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = countData,
                                    colData = colData,
                                    design = ~ condition)
dds$condition <- factor(dds$condition,
                            levels=c("untreated","treated"))
dds <- DESeq(dds)
dds <- results(dds)
pasilla <-subset(dds, !is.na(pvalue)) #No support for NAs yet

```


Apply multiple testing using DDHW and compare to BH.

```{r}
res_symphony <- ddhw_auto(pasilla$pvalue,pasilla$baseMean, 0.1, solver="Rsymphony", lp_relaxation=F)

weights(res_symphony)

rejections(res_symphony)

sum(p.adjust(pasilla$pvalue, method="BH") <= .1)
```
